Beavis - Throttling Data.SYNTAX: echo "CurrentTemp: $(cat sys/class/thermal/thermal_zone0/temp | awk '{print substr($0,1,length()-3)}')°C | Zone: $(cat sys/class/thermal/thermal_zone0/type) | Mode: $(cat sys/class/thermal/thermal_zone0/mode) | Policy: $(cat sys/class/thermal/thermal_zone0/policy) | SustainablePower: $(cat sys/class/thermal/thermal_zone0/sustainable_power | awk '{print substr($0,1,length()-3)}')Watts | TripTemp0: $(cat sys/class/thermal/thermal_zone0/trip_point_0_temp | awk '{print substr($0,1,length()-3)}')°C | TripType0: $(cat sys/class/thermal/thermal_zone0/trip_point_0_type) | TripTemp1: $(cat sys/class/thermal/thermal_zone0/trip_point_1_temp | awk '{print substr($0,1,length()-3)}')°C | TripType1: $(cat sys/class/thermal/thermal_zone0/trip_point_1_type) | TripTemp2: $(cat sys/class/thermal/thermal_zone0/trip_point_2_temp | awk '{print substr($0,1,length()-3)}')°C | TripType2: $(cat sys/class/thermal/thermal_zone0/trip_point_2_type) | TripTemp3: $(cat sys/class/thermal/thermal_zone0/trip_point_3_temp | awk '{print substr($0,1,length()-3)}')°C | TripType3: $(cat sys/class/thermal/thermal_zone0/trip_point_3_type)"
